definition: to show displeasure by thrusting out the lips or wearing a sullen expression
examples: Sure, you have sports figures misbehaving today. John McEnroe pouts and snarls and curses at tennis judges twice his age, on television …

definition: to push out or purse the lips in a sexually suggestive way
examples: … appears in adverts surrounded by gorgeous, pouting blondes.
If they invited her out, she declined the invitation. When they went out, she would be pouting when they came home.

definition: a protrusion of the lips expressive of displeasure
any of several large-headed fishes (such as a bullhead or eelpout)
